Type.Name: ListStore

TypeSignature.Value: public class ListStore : GLib.Object, TreeModel, IWrapper, TreeDragSource, TreeDragDest, TreeSortable, IWrapper, IDisposable

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: The ListStore is a columned list data structure to be used with widget. It is the model part in Model/View/Controller design paradigm. The contents of the ListStore can be sorted and are drag-and-drop ready.

Docs.returns: To be added: an object of type 'int'

Docs.summary: Removes a row from the store.
Docs.remarks: After being removed, iter is set to be the next valid row, or invalidated if it pointed to the last row in the store.
